1.text: Sorry to burden you, just wanted to ask a few questions.

2.text: Yes, my dearest, fairest princess, my—
Please, save it. Chachie has given enough jests for a lifetime of mediocrity.
Enough. Go romance a castle wall, you would have more chemistry.

11.text: So what does a high princess attend to, on a daily basis?
Balls, politics, intrigues, feasts, weddings — a great diversity of trinkets.
A lot of your subjects would kill for that life.
And I would not. I would kill for glory and to play a part in protecting my own subjects.
Very valiant of you — to become a princess warrior.
If only I could fly free.

12.text: Like it? You and everyone else in Aeterna proper.
As you can tell, I've had enough of _observation_, in recent months.
Life bores, as a princess. I long to be like you, a curious adventurer,
running about, sword and staff in hand, slaying monsters, inspiring trobairises across the land,
and actually having a claim to great wealth and nobility, through one own's actions.

21.text: Perhaps I could help you escape your royal chains.
If you could, please. I need decent equipment. And a nice sword.
Also, my parents know of my...free-spirited desires. You would need to incapacitate the royal household guards once we escape.

31.text: I'll try my best to secure equipment for you.
Look within the market. I need a light, well-balanced weapon, and specially fitted armor for my...figure.

32.text: As I have learned from many others in the royal court.

20.choiceText: I could help out with that.
